EmailTemplate.subject: Wevorce transition reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LegalZoom.com
View online
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
We're following up to make sure you're aware we are no longer offering divorce services in your area.
We've partnered with Wevorce to honor your LegalZoom purchase with no additional payment required so you can proceed with your order. Wevorce is available to answer your questions and ensure a smooth transition. Email welcome@wevorce.com or call (855) 938-6723 x1.
We're here to help.
Your LegalZoom Team
Manage My Account | Explore Services Privacy Policy
Please do not reply to this message. This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account.
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: $EMAIL_ADDRESS_$
